channel.title: JDK Problems? Please help someone!
channel.description: I keep getting that I haven't downloaded JDK when I go to compile ONLY ON A FEW SOURCES? But on other servers it works fine? I know I have downloaded it. It's saved and everything so can someone help me out?

item.title: JDK Problems? Please help someone!
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Goddess Pure Goddess
item.description:
@Pure_Goddess wrote:

Didn’t work. =( Well it’s doing it on a few sources now.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2008, 08:10:45 PM[/size][hr]Any1 help me please? The above 2 didn’t work?

Read full topic

item.title: JDK Problems? Please help someone!
item.dc:creator: @omfgxbarragedxxxxx omfgxbarragedxxxxx
item.description:
@omfgxbarragedxxxxx wrote:

use this compiler :
@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: JDK Problems? Please help someone!
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Goddess Pure Goddess
item.description:
@Pure_Goddess wrote:

I’ll try it now. Where you have entered my name do I just edit that to the name of my in-game character or w/e?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2008, 07:43:39 PM[/size][hr]I just did that but it still doesn’t work the complier.

After that I deleted everything in there and just added that and I got.
Path area could not be specified. But it’s funny because I though I had already fixed that?

Read full topic

item.title: JDK Problems? Please help someone!
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Because some sources don’t have the right compiler code. Edit the compiler by right clicking “edit” and post this in there:

@echo off
title Pure GoddessScape Compile
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic
